00057 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_2DPolygon {
00058 
00059 public:
00060 
00068     EGS_2DPolygon(vector<EGS_2DVector> &points, bool Open=false);
00069 
00071     ~EGS_2DPolygon();
00072 
00074     int getN() const {
00075         return np-1;
00076     };
00077 
00079     bool isConvex() const {
00080         return is_convex;
00081     };
00082 
00084     EGS_2DVector getNormal(int j) const {
00085         if (j >= 0 && j < np-1) {
00086             return a[j];
00087         }
00088         else {
00089             return EGS_2DVector();
00090         }
00091     };
00092 
00098     EGS_Float hownear(bool in, const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00099         if (!open) {
00100             EGS_Float tperp = 1e30;
00101             bool do_it = true;
00102             for (int j=0; j<np-1; j++) {
00103                 EGS_2DVector v(x - p[j]);
00104                 EGS_Float lam = uj[j]*v;
00105                 if (lam >= 0 && lam <= uj[j].length2()) {
00106                     do_it = false;
00107                     EGS_Float t = fabs(d[j] - x*a[j]);
00108                     if (t < tperp) {
00109                         tperp = t;
00110                     }
00111                 }
00112                 else if (lam < 0 && do_it) {
00113                     EGS_Float t = v.length();
00114                     if (t < tperp) {
00115                         tperp = t;
00116                     }
00117                 }
00118                 else {
00119                     do_it = true;
00120                 }
00121             }
00122             return tperp;
00123         }
00124         EGS_2DVector v(x - p[0]);
00125         EGS_Float lam = uj[0]*v;
00126         EGS_Float tperp;
00127         bool do_it;
00128         if (lam <= uj[0].length2()) {
00129             do_it = false;
00130             tperp = fabs(d[0] - x*a[0]);
00131         }
00132         else {
00133             do_it = true;
00134             tperp = 1e30;
00135         }
00136         v = x - p[1];
00137         lam = uj[1]*v;
00138         if (lam >= 0) {
00139             EGS_Float t = fabs(d[1] - x*a[1]);
00140             if (t < tperp) {
00141                 tperp = t;
00142             }
00143         }
00144         else if (do_it) {
00145             EGS_Float t = v.length();
00146             if (t < tperp) {
00147                 tperp = t;
00148             }
00149         }
00150         return tperp;
00151     };
00152 
00154     bool isInside(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00155         if (!open &&
00156                 (x.x<xmin || x.x>xmax || x.y<ymin || x.y>ymax)) {
00157             return false;
00158         }
00159         if (is_convex) {
00160             int nn = open ? np-2 : np-1;
00161             for (int j=0; j<nn; j++)
00162                 if (!inside(j,x)) {
00163                     return false;
00164                 }
00165             return true;
00166         }
00167         if (!cpol->isInside(x)) {
00168             return false;
00169         }
00170         for (int j=0; j<ncut; j++) if (cut[j]->isInside(x)) {
00171                 return false;
00172             }
00173         return true;
00174     };
00175 
00187     bool howfar(bool in, const EGS_2DVector &x, const EGS_2DVector &u,
00188                 EGS_Float &t, EGS_2DVector *normal = 0) {
00189         EGS_Float xp, up;
00190         bool res = false;
00191         int nn = open ? np-2 : np-1;
00192         if (in) {
00193             int jhit;
00194             for (int j=0; j<nn; j++)  {
00195                 if ((up = u*a[j]) < 0 && (xp = x*a[j]) > d[j]) {
00196                     EGS_Float tt = d[j] - xp;
00197                     if (tt >= t*up) {
00198                         tt /= up;
00199                         bool ok = is_convex || pc[j];
00200                         if (!ok) {
00201                             EGS_Float lam = uj[j]*(x-p[j]+u*tt);
00202                             if (lam >= 0 && lam < uj[j].length2()) {
00203                                 ok = true;
00204                             }
00205                         }
00206                         if (ok) {
00207                             t = tt;
00208                             res = true;
00209                             jhit = j;
00210                             //if( normal ) *normal = a[j];
00211                         }
00212                     }
00213                 }
00214             }
00215             if (res && normal) {
00216                 *normal = a[jhit];
00217             }
00218         }
00219         else {
00220             int jhit;
00221             if (open) {
00222                 if ((up = u*a[0]) > 0 && (xp = x*a[0]) < d[0]) {
00223                     EGS_Float tt = (d[0] - xp)/up;
00224                     if (tt <= t) {
00225                         EGS_Float lam = uj[0]*(x-p[0]+u*tt);
00226                         if (lam < uj[0].length2()) {
00227                             t = tt;
00228                             res = true;
00229                             jhit = 0;
00230                         }
00231                     }
00232                 }
00233                 if ((up = u*a[1]) > 0 && (xp = x*a[1]) < d[1]) {
00234                     EGS_Float tt = (d[1] - xp)/up;
00235                     if (tt <= t) {
00236                         EGS_Float lam = uj[1]*(x-p[1]+u*tt);
00237                         if (lam > 0) {
00238                             t = tt;
00239                             res = true;
00240                             jhit = 1;
00241                         }
00242                     }
00243                 }
00244             }
00245             else {
00246                 for (int j=0; j<nn; j++)  {
00247                     if ((up = u*a[j]) > 0 && (xp = x*a[j]) < d[j]) {
00248                         EGS_Float tt = (d[j] - xp)/up;
00249                         if (tt <= t) {
00250                             EGS_Float lam = uj[j]*(x-p[j]+u*tt);
00251                             if (lam >= 0 && lam < uj[j].length2()) {
00252                                 t = tt;
00253                                 res = true;
00254                                 jhit = j;
00255                                 //if( normal ) *normal = a[j]*(-1);
00256                             }
00257                         }
00258                     }
00259                 }
00260             }
00261             if (res && normal) {
00262                 *normal = a[jhit]*(-1);
00263             }
00264         }
00265         return res;
00266     };
00267 
00269     EGS_2DVector getPoint(int j) const {
00270         if (j >= 0 && j < np) {
00271             return p[j];
00272         }
00273         else {
00274             return EGS_2DVector();
00275         }
00276     };
00277 
00278 
00279 private:
00280 
00281     EGS_2DVector *p;   
00282     EGS_2DVector *a;   
00283     EGS_2DVector *uj;  
00284     EGS_Float    *d;   
00285     bool         *pc;  
00286 
00287     EGS_Float    xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax;
00288     int          np;   
00289     bool         is_convex; 
00290     bool         open; 
00293     int          ncut;  
00295     EGS_2DPolygon  **cut; 
00296     EGS_2DPolygon  *cpol; 
00297 
00300     static bool checkCCW(const vector<EGS_2DVector> &points);
00302     bool inside(int j, const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00303         if (x*a[j] >= d[j]) {
00304             return true;
00305         }
00306         else {
00307             return false;
00308         }
00309     };
00310 
00311 };

00327 template <class T>
00328 class EGS_EXPORT EGS_PolygonT {
00329 
00330 public:
00331 
00338     EGS_PolygonT(vector<EGS_2DVector> &points, const T &projector,
00339                  bool Open=false) : p(new EGS_2DPolygon(points,Open)), a(projector) {};
00340 
00342     ~EGS_PolygonT() {
00343         delete p;
00344     };
00345 
00347     inline bool isConvex() const {
00348         return p->isConvex();
00349     };
00350 
00352     inline int getN() const {
00353         return p->getN();
00354     };
00355 
00357     inline EGS_Vector getPoint(int j) const {
00358         return a.getPoint(p->getPoint(j));
00359     };
00360 
00362     inline EGS_Vector getNormal() const {
00363         return a.normal();
00364     };
00365 
00367     inline EGS_Vector getNormal(const EGS_2DVector &x) const {
00368         return a.normal(x);
00369     };
00370 
00372     inline EGS_Vector getNormal(int j) const {
00373         return a.normal(p->getNormal(j));
00374     };
00375 
00377     inline EGS_2DVector getProjection(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00378         return a.getProjection(x);
00379     };
00380 
00382     inline EGS_Float distance(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00383         return a.distance(x);
00384     };
00385 
00387     inline bool isInside2D(const EGS_2DVector &xp) const {
00388         return p->isInside(xp);
00389     };
00390 
00393     inline bool isInside2D(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00394         return p->isInside(a.getProjection(x));
00395     };
00396 
00399     inline bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00400         return (a.distance(x) >= 0);
00401     };
00402 
00405     inline EGS_Float hownear2D(bool in, const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00406         return p->hownear(in,a.getProjection(x));
00407     };
00408 
00411     inline EGS_Float hownear(bool in, const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00412         EGS_2DVector pos(a.getProjection(x));
00413         EGS_Float t1 = fabs(a.distance(x));
00414         if (p->isInside(pos)) {
00415             return t1;
00416         }
00417         EGS_Float t2 = p->hownear(true,pos);
00418         return sqrt(t1*t1+t2*t2);
00419     };
00420 
00426     inline bool howfar2D(bool in, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00427                          EGS_Float &t, EGS_2DVector *normal = 0) const {
00428         EGS_2DVector dir(a.getProjection(u));
00429         if (u.length2() < 1e-8) {
00430             return false;
00431         }
00432         return p->howfar(in,a.getProjection(x),dir,t,normal);
00433     };
00434 
00441     inline bool howfar(bool in, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00442                        EGS_Float &t) const {
00443         EGS_Float up = a*u;
00444         if (in && up >= 0  || !in && up <= 0) {
00445             return false;
00446         }
00447         EGS_Float tt = -a.distance(x)/up;
00448         if (tt <= t) {
00449             EGS_Vector xp(x + u*tt);
00450             if (p->isInside(a.getProjection(xp))) {
00451                 t = tt;
00452                 return true;
00453             }
00454         }
00455         return false;
00456     };
00457 
00459     const string &getType() const {
00460         return a.getType();
00461     };
00462 
00463 private:
00464 
00465     EGS_2DPolygon *p;
00466     T             a;
00467 
00468 };

00473 typedef EGS_PolygonT<EGS_YProjector> EGS_PolygonXZ;

00477 typedef EGS_PolygonT<EGS_Projector>  EGS_Polygon;
